concept: MCQs on basic OS definition and functions.

challenges.title: Q1: Role of OS
challenges.description: An Operating System is best described as:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) A hardware device that stores data
b) A collection of programs that manage computer resources
c) A high-level language compiler
d) An application program used for editing text
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: OS as Interface
challenges.description: Operating System acts as an interface between:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) User and compiler
b) Hardware and network
c) User and hardware
d) Secondary memory and CPU only
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
